scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, identified by his halo, riding an ass into a walled city. He is accompanied by several followers, one of whom, dressed in red, holds a green book. Christ is gesturing with his right hand. To the right, a figure in an orange tunic is visible near a building with conical blue roofs and arched openings. The ground is rendered as green with yellow grass and foliage. The background is a decorative green pattern with gold swirls.
